meanings.sent1: The unfavored toy sat untouched in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: She felt unfavored when her friends chose to play without her.
meanings.sent3: The unfavored flavor of ice cream was left melting in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The unfavored candidate struggled to gain any votes in the election.
meanings.sent5: The unfavored color clashed with the rest of the room, making it stand out.

meanings.sent1: The unfavored team had few fans cheering for them during the match.
meanings.sent2: Her unfavored idea was quickly dismissed by the group.
meanings.sent3: The unfavored proposal was met with raised eyebrows and skepticism.
meanings.sent4: The unfavored project struggled to secure funding from investors.
meanings.sent5: The unfavored policy faced strong opposition from the community.

meanings.sent1: The unfavored student was often left out of group activities.
meanings.sent2: His unfavored behavior earned him a reputation among his peers.
meanings.sent3: The unfavored movie received negative reviews from critics.
meanings.sent4: The unfavored song was skipped by most listeners on the radio.
meanings.sent5: The unfavored dish was left uneaten at the end of the dinner party.
